subject: Re: [junit] DataBase Testing
msgSnippet: ... Project ownership changed a few versions ago and it served its purpose as database for unit testing in a couple of our projects reasonably well. Johannes
messageBody:
> I had been wary of this product, because it looked like it wasn't ready
> for prime time. If you say it's good, then I should take another look.

Project ownership changed a few versions ago and it served its purpose as
database for unit testing in a couple of our projects reasonably well.

Johannes
